name: typescript-modular-discord-bot
description: Multi-purpose Discord bot TypeScript base, designed to be modular and easy to work with.

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/webui/public && cp -r src/webui/public/* dist/webui/public/ && find src/bot/modules -name 'module.json' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p dist/bot/modules/$(dirname {} | sed "s|src/bot/modules/||") && cp {} dist/bot/modules/$(dirname {} | sed "s|src/bot/modules/||")/' \; && find src/bot/modules -name 'settingsSchema.json' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p dist/bot/modules/$(dirname {} | sed "s|src/bot/modules/||") && cp {} dist/bot/modules/$(dirname {} | sed "s|src/bot/modules/||")/' \;
scripts.copy-assets-prod: mkdir -p dist/webui/public && cp -r smdb-source/webui/public/* dist/webui/public/ 2>/dev/null || true && find smdb-source/bot/modules -name 'module.json' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p dist/bot/modules/$(dirname {} | sed "s|smdb-source/bot/modules/||") && cp {} dist/bot/modules/$(dirname {} | sed "s|smdb-source/bot/modules/||")/' \; 2>/dev/null || true && find smdb-source/bot/modules -name 'settingsSchema.json' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p dist/bot/modules/$(dirname {} | sed "s|smdb-source/bot/modules/||") && cp {} dist/bot/modules/$(dirname {} | sed "s|smdb-source/bot/modules/||")/' \; 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --ignore src/bot/config.json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.dev:bot: nodemon --watch src/bot --ext ts,json --ignore src/bot/config.json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/bot/index.ts
scripts.dev:webui: nodemon --watch src/webui --ext ts,json --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/webui/index.ts
scripts.docker:run: docker build -t typescript-modular-discord-bot . && docker run --rm -it -v %cd%:/app -p 3000:3000 typescript-modular-discord-bot
scripts.docker:run-env: docker build -t typescript-modular-discord-bot . && docker run --rm -it --env-file .env -v ${PWD}:/app typescript-modular-discord-bot

author: kriz_cold
